Reviews.Title: Perfect fit for our needs
Reviews.Author: Debi Maskell
Reviews.Content: Exactly what my husband needed. He is non-technical and was able to use it with little instruction.  Allows him to browse the net & access email easily.

Reviews.Title: 9" Android tablet
Reviews.Author: Mickie Jones
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet. Instead of taking my laptop places,  I can take my tablet. I HAve No problems with the tablet.I'm so glad I got this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet
Reviews.Author: Rosanne
Reviews.Content: This tablet does a great job!  I have had it a while now and it performs well.  I am used to the Android system, so it works for me.  I use it alot and love that it has the camera to skype with!  Good for the money

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice
Reviews.Author: Robert Austin
Reviews.Content: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR AND AT THE PRICE I WAS WILLING TO PAY!!!Not the be-all-end-all tablet, but does what it's supposed to and does it well.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Erika75
Reviews.Content: My son loves his tablet, but stated that he was unable to download all of the free apps which I can't understand. Someone at the computer repair store is wiling to help with this. He still likes the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: chris cunningham
Reviews.Content: It's an okay buy for the money...it's a bit slow and doesn't download 50% of the time...but to play games on it's okay

Reviews.Title: Total Reject
Reviews.Author: Alvin Bonaparte
Reviews.Content: The tablet was very slow with app downloads and would frequently lose WiFi connection.  All other devices in my home always stayed connected.  Returned after 3 days..

Reviews.Title: Laggy and unresponsive
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The display is not very responsive to input. The device lags on simple games like temple runner. Invest in more quality.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Jarvis
Reviews.Content: The tablet continued to freeze and would not hold a wifi connection. The screen went blank and I had to turn the tablet off after about 20 minutes of usage

Reviews.Title: Save ur money, I should have
Reviews.Author: Florence Weeble "Flo"
Reviews.Content: I am sorry to say that here is where the old saying, "you get what you pay for," Proves absolutely true. Though I paid over $100 for this Android tablet, I really should have put that money as a down payment on an iPad. As that is exactly what I am using now to type this review. In fact, for about the same cost for this tablet I could have purchased Kindle, or Nook (from Barnes&Noble;) and those would have worked much faster and with fewer hiccups. The Android works fine for playing AngryBirds or e-book reading... and not much else.

Reviews.Title: TABLET FEAR
Reviews.Author: REMY.2012
Reviews.Content: I GUESS LIKE ANY CUSTOMER, I TOO HAD FEAR OF A NO BIG NAME PRODUCT AN A GREAT PRICE TO BOOT.SO I WAITED FOR MY TABLET TO ARRIVE SO I CAN PUT MY FEAR TO REST. FINALLY IT ARRIVED WELL PACKED.THE MOMENT OF TRUTH HAD FINALLY ARRIVED SO I OPEN TAKE OUT AND CHARGE MY NO JOKING VERY NICE LOOKING SAVE ME A BUNDLE TABLET. WELL NOW I KNOW WHERE TO SEND MY FRIENDS!

Reviews.Title: 9" Android
Reviews.Author: Darcy Bergh
Reviews.Content: This is a nice product, my 7 year old son uses it primarily to play games while we are traveling in the car .
